Correct. 10chars

Hmm I really don't know what the problem is do you have any idea when I hit the G key nothing happens and when I right click the only option is to turn on the main gear lights and that's it

Hmm I really don't know what the problem is do you have any idea when I hit the G key nothing happens and when I right click the only option is to turn on the main gear lights and that's it

It could be a conflict with another mod you have installed. Also are you using the latest version of KSOS (4.09HF?)

It could be a conflict with another mod you have installed. Also are you using the latest version of KSOS (4.09HF?)

Yeah im using the latest version and I saw something on my other mod the IXS enterprise that has a main door with in .25 had an option to open but now that option is gone also which is weird

Yeah im using the latest version and I saw something on my other mod the IXS enterprise that has a main door with in .25 had an option to open but now that option is gone also which is weird

Sounds like firespitter is missing or wrong version. Theres a 0.90 compatible dll in the firespitter thread (and probably been linked in here)

Make sure Smokescreen is installed (it should be if you installed the KSOS properly). If it is, try updating it to the latest version.

As mentioned, indeed I had a partial installation, and only placed a piece of the KSO folder there. None of the additional mods were installed.

So, your fix works perfectly for me! Thank you very much!

Is anyone else having an issue with JSI and the KSO Shuttle? I am, and I don't know what mod it is, because I uninstalled the mod that I downloaded that caused it to do this but it didn't stop.

http://imgur.com/a/8OpEb

Did you download this patch update for RPM's http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57603-0-25-RasterPropMonitor-putting-the-A-in-your-IVA-%28v0-18-3%29-8-Oct?p=1610931&viewfull=1#post1610931 if so you using ATM ?

Is anyone else having an issue with JSI and the KSO Shuttle? I am, and I don't know what mod it is, because I uninstalled the mod that I downloaded that caused it to do this but it didn't stop.

http://imgur.com/a/8OpEb

I fixed this by deleting the JSI folder that came with the KSO and installing the full RPM mod, then using the patch that MeCripp mentioned. Hope it works for you!

KSOS works just fine for me with updates to its dependencies.

This mod sadly doesn't work for me... It says the firespitter plugin is not working as well.

This mod sadly doesn't work for me... It says the firespitter plugin is not working as well.

You need to update Firespitter to the version for 0.90. You'll also want to make sure that you update Smokescreen and JSI/RPM to their .90 versions and the mod will work.

can you make a version for apple computers?

can you make a version for apple computers?

No reason why this shouldn't work on Mac. I use it all the time

can you make a version for apple computers?

If you're trying to use the installers, which are linked first at the beginning of the thread, they won't work on Mac OS X unless you have Wine installed, and even then you may still need a dependency or two. Right under the image/link to the installers is one for "manual installation". It would probably be less of a headache to download the mod that way and install what parts you want, or the whole thing if you don't have Wine, or are unfamiliar with how it works. sp1989 is right, there is no reason the mod would not work on OS X, I too have downloaded and used parts from this mod using the manual installation option.
